TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlAnchor extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class HtmlAnchor Inherits HtmlContainerControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩種方式使用類別。There are two ways to use the class. 第一個方法是瀏覽： 使用屬性可定義要連結至之頁面的位置。The first is for navigation: using the property to define the location of the page to link to. 第二個是回傳事件： 使用事件，以程式設計方式處理使用者的按下的連結。The second is for postback events: using the event to programmatically handle the user's clicking a link. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以顯示一則訊息時按一下控制項時。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchor/CS/htmlanchorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchor/VB/htmlanchorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出按一下 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果按一下 時會執行驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 頁面驗證判斷控制項是否在通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則 頁面上驗證控制項相關聯。Page validation determines whether controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 您可以指定，或決定是否要在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時藉由按下控制項屬性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要避免執行驗證，將屬性設定為 false。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to false.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the link specified in the server control.
The URL target of the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定要時連結 URL按一下控制項時。Use this property to specify the URL to link to when the control is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定網頁瀏覽至時按一下控制項時。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a Web page to navigate to when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在 伺服器控制項中定義的書籤名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the bookmark name defined in the server control.
The bookmark name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來標記區段在網頁上的名稱。Use this property to mark a section on a Web page with a name. 這可讓您從任何地方連結至這個區段在相同頁面上。This allows you to link to this section from anywhere on the same page. 例如，您可以提供直接網頁上的主題將連結的頁面頂端的目錄。For example, you can provide a table of contents at the top of a page that will link directly to topics on the page. 若要連結至標示的區段，請使用用來控制屬性設定為 區段名稱前面加上 # 符號 (\To link to a marked section, use an control with the property set to the name of the section, preceded by a # symbol (\). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用標示不同區段上網頁上，並從內容的資料表連結至這些屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to mark different sections on the Web page, and link to them from a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 這個方法可讓您提供該事件的自訂處理常式。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此伺服器事件會導致用戶端與伺服器之間的來回往返。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式指定，以程式碼的事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 當按下控制項時，會顯示一則訊息。When the control is clicked, a message is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會修改上述範例，以程式設計的方式指定程式碼的事件處理常式事件。The following code example modifies the preceding example to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClick/CS/htmlanchorserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClick/VB/htmlanchorserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

[!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會修改上一個範例，以程式設計的方式指定程式碼的事件處理常式事件。The following code example modifies the previous example to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定瀏覽器視窗或框架 (Frame) 的名稱，此視窗或框架會顯示當按一下 控制項時，Web 網頁所連結的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page that is linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 瀏覽器視窗或框架，顯示當按一下 時，Web 網頁所連結的內容。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the is clicked.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，指定的目標視窗或框架，顯示的連結時的 Web 網頁內容按一下控制項時。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page that is linked to when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性`a`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。The `target` attribute on `a` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 請勿設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出為必須符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be compliant with XHTML 1.1. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，請避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必須以中範圍的 A 到 Z （不區分大小寫），除了下列的特殊值，其中以底線開頭字母為開頭。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 `_search` 目標值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性時顯示頁面巡覽unframed 新視窗中按一下控制項時。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the page that is navigated to when the control is clicked in a new, unframed window. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定滑鼠指標停在 控制項時顯示的工具提示文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer is placed over the control.

value.span: 滑鼠指標停在 之上時顯示的文字。

span.span: The text displayed when the mouse pointer is placed over the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來提供的自訂工具提示控制項。Use this property to provide a custom ToolTip for the control. 當滑鼠指標停留在控制項上時，會顯示此文字。This text is displayed when the mouse pointer rests over the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性為工具提示中提供自訂文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the ToolTip. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以獨立於其他的驗證群組頁面上進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 屬性沒有作用時，才值屬性設定為`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員驗證控制項的驗證時控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值和屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上驗證群組未指派。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
